channel.title: Keyboard + Mouse upgrade
channel.description:
http://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/A-Jazz-Q7-2400DPI-Gaming-Mouse-A-Jazz-K701-RED-Backlit-Multimedia-Keyboard-UK-/200952691752?pt=UK_Computing_ComputerComponents_JoysticksJoypadsGamepads&hash=item2ec9b6bc28
It's time I upgraded my shiz, AGAIN. Can you guys tell me if this Keyboard + mouse set is good or not? It looks appealing to me. 2400 DPI, A ghost button, the keyboard is decent too.

item.title: Keyboard + Mouse upgrade
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I just play decent games, like: LoL, Minecraft, Marvel Heroes etc.
I just needed a keyboard… But I liked the mouse, so I wanted to buy it >.<

Read full topic

item.title: Keyboard + Mouse upgrade
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Unless you’re playing a game where those keyboards/mouses are actually useful, it’s not worth it. However if you play something like World of Warcraft, a mmo mouse is great.

I only play League of Legends, so there’s no need for a gaming keyboard. I do however use a SteelSeries Sensei and SteelSeries mousepad - great combo

Read full topic

item.title: Keyboard + Mouse upgrade
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

well its not a gaming mouse, with 2400 dpi its below average dpi for a gaming mouse but for a typical mouse its above.
if it doesnt break within a year, you get what u paid 4
